availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Louisville, Jefferson County, Ky. A Kentucky-born merchant. Married Caroline Everton.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, p. 140.

Find A Grave, Entry for Mason W. Sherrill (1809-1901), Find A Grave Memorial # 21462331, Eastern Cemetery, Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=21462331&ref=acom (accessed 26 May 2017).
